Name: rsync
Other information: client & server operation.  Multiple comparison criteria (date, check-sum).

Name: Synchronizer (krusader)
Other information: Synchronizer no longer in active development

Name: LocalBox
Other information: Files can be shared but cannot be read by a server admin, because data is de/en-crypted on the client

Name: Unison
Protocol: similar to rsync, transfers over network socket, rsh, encrypted ssh, or file systems
Other information: best network efficiency, mature and stable; development reached active maintenance

Name: FTP LiveSync
Other OS: Focused to sync code and text files between pc and webserver

Name: BitTorrent Sync
Protocol: Windows / Mac OS X / Linux / FreeBSD / Android / iOS
Linux: Yes (previous versions moved to archive folder)

Name: Cobian Backup
Other OS: Backup software with folder synchronization feature; remote management; Shadow Copy

Name: Windows Mobile Device Center
Other OS: Syncs mobile devices; successor to Microsoft ActiveSync

Name: Gbridge
Other OS: Sync folders, live web browsing, etc.

Name: Microsoft Sync Framework
Other OS: Syncs files, data, services; a framework, not a tool

Name: Magic Mirror Sync
Detect conflict: No, Monitoring synchronizing folder continuously (once a minute)

Name: Windows Live Mesh (discontinued 13 February 2013)
Protocol: Windows (Vista and greater), Windows Mobile, OSX

Name: OmniGroup OmniPresence
Protocol: OSX, OmniGroup software for iOS, open source framework available
Linux: No, via local Time Machine backup only
Other OS: Sync local folders via OmniSync or WebDAV server but not to the server itself
Detect conflict: No, syncs whenever it's online and not paused

Name: Windows Live Sync (discontinued 31 March 2011)
Other OS: Sync folders, browse devices from website, remote access; was Microsoft FolderShare, 20,000 file limit

Name: CloudMe
Mac OS X: Yes, iPhone, Android, Google TV, Samsung TV

Name: Cubby - Free
Windows: No native client, can access via WebDav
Detect conflict: Yes Renames older and keeps both

Name: Cubby - Pro
Windows: No native client, can access via WebDav
Detect conflict: Yes Renames older and keeps both

Name: EDpCloud EnduraData
column19: Yes, case preserving, meta data preserving

Name: Gladinet
Mac OS X: Yes, Android, iPad, iPhone, Windows RT, Blackberry

Name: GoodSync
Mac OS X: Yes, Android, iPad, iPhone, USB flash drive

Name: SugarSync
Mac OS X: Yes, Android, BlackBerry, iPhone, Windows Mobile

Name: Syncdocs

Name: Tonido
